title: (Tues Early Bird) Bobby’s Top 5 Country Songs of the Summer + Amy’s Awkward Mixup at a Mexican Restaurant + Mailbag: Cheating Husband or Friendly Guy?
itunes:title: (Tues Early Bird) Bobby’s Top 5 Country Songs of the Summer + Amy’s Awkward Mixup at a Mexican Restaurant + Mailbag: Cheating Husband or Friendly Guy?
description:
Bobby shares his top 5 country songs for Summer 2022. Be sure to add these to your playlist! Amy had an awkward encounter at a Mexican restaurant that involved a sombrero mixup. In the mailbag, we try to help a listener who has issues with her husband texting with women that he works with. Is he just being friendly or are there signs of cheating?

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
